name: Elven Crossbow
description: Breathtakingly carved of enchanted Elven wood, it isn't the most powerful but is unmatched in grace.

name: Egg Crossbow
description: A crossbow modified to fire projectile eggs. Getting shot by this bad boy is painful AND humilating!

name: Adamant Pickaxe
description: The ideal tool for busting down stone and ore. Also useful for picking up decorations.

name: Enhanced Iron Pickaxe
description: A pickaxe, enhanced with concrete and dark magic to empower mining within the Withergate mines.

name: Adamant Hoe
description: Tills the land, turning grass into farmable soil.

name: Adamant Axe
description: This will make short work of trees and stumps.

name: Enhanced Iron Axe
description: An axe, enhanced with concrete and dark magic to empower woodcutting within Withergate forests.

name: Golden Fishing Rod
description: Though it's only painted gold, it's enchanted to grant coins every time you catch a fish. Nice! Increases Fishing skill by 8 and grants gold coins each time you catch a fish.

name: Adamant Watering Can
description: Holds plenty of water for your thirsty crops.

name: Adamant Sword
description: A well-honed blade, friend to every warrior.

name: Carrot Sword
description: Strike down your foes with the might of a hundred hungry bunnies!

name: Adamant Helmet
description: A mind is a terrible thing to waste, so keep yours protected with this metal helmet.

name: Magma Gloves
description: Gloves of elemental fire, forged by ancient Elemental smiths using a technique that modern smiths have been unable to successfully replicate.

name: Money Maker Gloves
description: An enchanted pair of gloves that conjures images of vast wealth about your person. Make it rain!

name: Adamant Chest Plate
description: Super heavy, but is great protection.

name: Magma Headband
description: A headband of elemental fire, forged by ancient Elemental smiths using a technique that modern smiths have been unable to successfully replicate.

name: Money Maker Tophat
description: An enchanted top hat that conjures images of vast wealth about your person. Make it rain!

name: Rapunzel Shirt (Orange)
description: Let down your hair in this shirt.

name: Rapunzel Shirt (Yellow)
description: Let down your hair in this shirt.

name: Adamant Legs
description: They clank whenever you walk, but they'll keep your legs shielded.

name: Magma Pants
description: Legguards of elemental fire, forged by ancient Elemental smiths using a technique that modern smiths have been unable to successfully replicate.

name: Money Maker Pants
description: An enchanted pair of pants that conjures images of vast wealth about your person. Make it rain!

name: Soldier's Boots
description: Made of durable leather, fitting footwear for long marches over any terrain.

name: High Jumper Shoes
description: Bouncy rubber shoes. These will really put a spring in your step!

name: Rapunzel Skirt (Purple)
description: Based on the clothes of a classic storybook character. Long hair sold separately.

name: Rapunzel Skirt (Black)
description: Based on the clothes of a classic storybook character. Long hair sold separately.

name: Rapunzel Skirt (Blue)
description: Based on the clothes of a classic storybook character. Long hair sold separately.

name: Rapunzel Skirt (Orange)
description: Based on the clothes of a classic storybook character. Long hair sold separately.

name: Rapunzel Skirt (Red)
description: Based on the clothes of a classic storybook character. Long hair sold separately.

name: Rapunzel Skirt (White)
description: Based on the clothes of a classic storybook character. Long hair sold separately.

name: Rapunzel Skirt (Green)
description: Based on the clothes of a classic storybook character. Long hair sold separately.

name: Rapunzel Skirt (Pink)
description: Based on the clothes of a classic storybook character. Long hair sold separately.

name: Rapunzel Skirt (Yellow)
description: Based on the clothes of a classic storybook character. Long hair sold separately.

name: Adamant Gloves
description: Keeps your fingers safe!

name: Magma Chestplate
description: A chestplate of elemental fire, forged by ancient Elemental smiths using a technique that modern smiths have been unable to successfully replicate.

name: Money Maker Coat
description: An enchanted coat that conjures images of vast wealth about your person. Make it rain!

name: Delicate Gloves
description: Extra soft, they'll protect anything you touch from the roughness of your hands.

name: Elven Gloves
description: Gloves of sophisticated Elven make.

name: Forest Hunter's Gloves
description: Stretched and smoothed fabric gloves, totally silent as the hunter stalks their prey.

name: Spark Gloves
description: Padded fabric gloves, they give the fingers extra protection against prolonged use of magic from your fingertips.

name: Claw Gloves
description: Claws need gloves, too.

name: Slime Gloves
description: Gloves covered in an infinite coating of slime. How... nice?

name: Black Cape
description: A thick cape of dyed silk, this will keep you feeling warm and looking stylish.

name: Green Cape
description: A thick cape of dyed silk, this will keep you feeling warm and looking stylish.

name: Orange Cape
description: A thick cape of dyed silk, this will keep you feeling warm and looking stylish.

name: Red Cape
description: A thick cape of dyed silk, this will keep you feeling warm and looking stylish.

name: Gray Cape
description: A thick cape of dyed silk, this will keep you feeling warm and looking stylish.

name: Iron Ring
description: A simple looking iron ring, it has actually been enchanted to impart increased strength to its wearer.

name: Ruby Ring
description: A roughly cut ruby set in a band of iron, it trades away elegant beauty in exchange for vitality and might.

name: Farmer's Ring
description: An emerald ring bearing the crest of a rising sprout. If you can't have a green thumb, at least you can have a green ring.

name: Miner's Blessing Ring
description: A miner's insignia, carried by wayward miners as a token of protection while they dig through the dark earth. It increases one's affinity for mining when worn.

name: Explorer's Blessing Ring
description: A ring that has been enchanted to give extra speed and stamina to its wearer, adventurers are quite fond of its ability to hasten travels.

name: Fisherman's Blessing Ring
description: A strange ring of carved leviathan bone, a fisherman's incantation has been placed on it, increasing one's fishing prowess.

name: Bounty Hunter's Ring
description: Wearing this ring signifies its wearer as a bounty hunter- so bounties beware!

name: Ring of Quiet
description: A powerful enchantment on this ring suppresses the noise its wearer makes, this would really come in handy while fishing.

name: Fruit Ring
description: Tiny gemstones carved into the shape of fruit are set on this ring. Imbued with the spirit of fruit, it grants proficiency in growing crops.

name: Gold Scrap Ring
description: An enchanted ring crafted from a flake of discarded gold, it brings its wearer great luck in financial fortune.

name: Adventure Keepsake
description: A token kept by those whose hearts are set on adventure, it fills you with strength.

name: Riches Keepsake
description: A token kept by those whose hearts are set on riches, it bestows you with great financial fortune.

name: Romance Keepsake
description: A token kept by those whose hearts are set on romance, it imparts an air of charm to your words and actions.

name: Peace Keepsake
description: A token kept by those whose hearts are set on peace, it grants a boost to your farming skill as you cultivate the land.

name: Time Keepsake
description: A token kept by those who value their time above all else, wielding this proves you're tired of all these homesick Lynns on this intro cutscene train.

name: Rapunzel Shirt (Black)
description: Let down your hair in this shirt.

name: Rapunzel Shirt (Blue)
description: Let down your hair in this shirt.

name: Rapunzel Shirt (Teal)
description: Let down your hair in this shirt.

name: Rapunzel Shirt (Pink)
description: Let down your hair in this shirt.

name: Rapunzel Shirt (Purple)
description: Let down your hair in this shirt.

name: Rapunzel Shirt (Red)
description: Let down your hair in this shirt.

name: Rapunzel Shirt (White)
description: Let down your hair in this shirt.

name: Spectre Helmet
description: A hood imbued with the essence of a fallen Shadeclaw, the monster's shadowy power still lingers in the cloth and amplifies its wielder's magical prowess.

name: Aerodynamic Helmet
description: A helmet of fine griffon feathers, this armor reduces air resistance and allows its wearer to strike with great force and accuracy.

name: Spectre Robe
description: A robe imbued with the essence of a fallen Shadeclaw, the monster's shadowy power still lingers in the cloth and amplifiers its wielder's magical prowess.

name: Aerodynamic Chest Plate
description: A chestpiece of fine griffon feathers, this armor reduces air resistance and allows its wearer to strike with great force and accuracy.

name: Aerodynamic Plate Legs
description: Leggings of fine griffon feathers, this armor reduces air resistance and allows its wearer to strike with great force and accuracy.

name: Aerodynamic Wings
description: A cloak of fine griffon feathers, this armor reduces air resistance and allows its wearer to strike with great force and accuracy.
